titleStmt.title: Amanda, a sacrifice to an unknown goddesse, or, A free-will offering of a loving heart to a sweet-heart by N.H. of Trinity Colledge in Cambridge
titleStmt.author: Hookes, Nicholas, 1628-1712.
Drayton, Michael, 1563-1631. England's heroical epistles. Latin & English. Selections.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. and E.M. for Humphrey Tuckey ...,

notesStmt.note: "Miscellanea poetica ... cui annectuntur epistolae, Rosamundae Henrico, et Henrici Rosamundae, quas clarissimus olim poëta nostras Michael Draiton armiger nostratibus dedit; carminibus Latinis redditae ..." (p. [91]-191) has separate t.p.
Drayton's "Epistle of Rosamund to King Henry the Second" (p. 164-191), with a Latin translation by Hookes, is printed with Latin and English on opposite pages.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
